blackbeard:LoadTheCannons.NAME: Load the Cannons
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, and then every #b4 turns, add a #yCannonball into your hand.

blackbeard:HipFlask.NAME: Hip Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yblackbeard:Resistance.

blackbeard:BloodOrange.NAME: Blood Orange
blackbeard:BloodOrange.FLAVOR: This citrus seems to have an interesting power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b7 cards in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.

blackbeard:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
blackbeard:TreasureChest.FLAVOR: This treasure chest contains untold riches.

blackbeard:WhitePearl.NAME: White Pearl
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you equip a #yblackbeard:Weapon, give it #b+1 Attack.

blackbeard:CannonballsOfSteel.NAME: Cannonballs of Steel
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yCannonballs deal #b2 more damage. (Works with every type of #yCannonball [REMOVE_SPACE].)

blackbeard:MagicalCauldron.NAME: Magical Cauldron
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each combat, obtain a random potion.

blackbeard:Penknife.NAME: Penknife
blackbeard:Penknife.FLAVOR: If you have it in your pocket, don't forget to use it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b8th Attack that uses at least one #yblackbeard:Weapon deals double damage.

blackbeard:PoorMathSkills.NAME: Poor Math Skills
blackbeard:PoorMathSkills.FLAVOR: Sometimes failing a math class is a good thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: You think that you have gained #b500 more #yGold this run than you actually did. (It matters for cards that scale with #yGold gained this run.)

blackbeard:PowderCan.NAME: Powder Can
blackbeard:PowderCan.FLAVOR: Just like a Powder Keg, but smaller.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, equip a #b0 / #b1 #yblackbeard:Weapon. When it is destroyed, deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:SoberMinded.NAME: Sober-minded
blackbeard:SoberMinded.FLAVOR: Being sober is not a natural state for The Blackbeard.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, and then every #b6 turns, lose #b1 #yblackbeard:Resistance.

blackbeard:Spearhead.NAME: Spearhead
blackbeard:Spearhead.FLAVOR: The durability of your Weapon ends... and so does the life of your enemy.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a #yblackbeard:Weapon has #b1 Durability, it deals #b3 more damage.

blackbeard:Karategi.NAME: Karategi
blackbeard:Karategi.FLAVOR: When you wear it, you instantly learn new styles of combat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yblackbeard:Weapons have infinite Durability. After you attack with a #yblackbeard:Weapon, it goes to the last position.

blackbeard:LoadTheGoldenCannons.NAME: Load the Golden Cannons
blackbeard:LoadTheGoldenCannons.FLAVOR: Is it even worth to shoot all these golden cannonballs?!?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yLoad #ythe #yCannons. At the start of each combat, and then every #b4 turns, add a #yGolden #yCannonball into your hand.
